id.description: The unique ID of the test result

case_id.description: The ID of the test case (Util field. Not returned in response.)

status_id.description: The status of the test result, e.g. passed or failed

test_id.description: The ID of the test this test result belongs to

comment.description: The comment or error message of the test result

defects.description: A comma-separated list of defects linked to the test result

version.description: The (build) version the test was executed against

elapsed.description: The amount of time it took to execute the test (e.g. '1m' or '2m 30s')

created_by.description: The ID of the user who created the test result

created_on.description: The date/time when the test result was created (as UNIX timestamp)

assignedto_id.description: The ID of the assignee (user) of the test result
